titleStmt.title: Mercvrivs Aqvaticvs, or, The vvater-poets ansvver to all that hath or shall be writ by Mercvrivs Britanicvs
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the waine of the moone pag. 121, and number 16, of Mercurius Britanicus,

notesStmt.note: Reprint of Mercurius Britannicus, no. 16, Dec. 7-14, 1643, p. 121-126, that Taylor half parodies, half satirizes, piece by piece.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.

place.placeName: the waine of the moone pag. 121
